content: com 3 continue on to instep working one complete round knitting that last triplet stitch on right side of heel as one stitch then start decreasing the gusset stitches out until back to the original stitch count as follows round 1 ssk knit gusset stitches which should be about 4 - 6 depending on how many were added sm work instep sm knit to 2 st from end on instep k2tog round 2 work without decreasing knitting all stitches continue this way until gusset stitches are gone and back to original stitch count foot knit in slipped stitch pattern on instep only until approximately 1 5 1 5 1 75 1 75 2 2 inches shorter than desired foot length toe if desired switch to your contrast color round 1 knit round 2 decrease round k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before end of instep k2tog k1 repeat across sole stitches then work round 1 three times round 2 once then round 1 two times round 2 once twice then work rounds 1 2 until 28 32 32 36 36 36 stitches remain 14 16 16 18 18 18 st per side then work round 2 only until 20 20 24 24 24 28 stitches remain 10 10 12 12 12 14 per needle graft with kitchener stitch weave in loose ends toe up instructions toe using judy s magic cast on cast on 20 20 24 24 24 28 stitches 10 10 12 12 12 14 per needle knit the set up round round 1 k1 m1r knit to last stitch of instep m1l k1 repeat for sole stitches round 2 knit repeat these two rounds until you have 56 60 64 68 72 76 stitches foot knit in slipped stitch pattern as instructed above on instep only until about 3 from desired foot length check your row gauge mini wedge gusset is 12-16 rounds depending on how many gusset stitches you added and the heel adds 18 20 20 22 24 26 row to your length so for example with my gauge and 6 gusset stitches per side my gusset is about 1 and my heel is about another 1 5 - 2 heel with mini wedge gusset work the mini wedge gusset and garter stitch heel in the same way as instructed above leg knit in slipped stitch pattern as instructed above to desired leg length cuff work 1x1 half-twisted rib cuff for 20 rounds or until desired length knit 2 rounds for a cute mini rolled edge ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 4 my preferred bind off for toe up socks is the suspended bind off not too flarey just the right amount of stretch shadow wrap short row ksw knit shadow wrap with right hand needle lift the top of the stitch below the next stitch so the mama of the next stitch onto left hand needle knit the lifted stitch being careful not to twist
